Some cool and interesting things about me, Wynter  

## A brief introduction

This is me: 
<img src="images/headshot.JPG" style="width:75%">

My name is Wynter Henry, I'm 22 years old and I'm currently a MS in Epidemiology candidate at Columbia Univeristy Mailman School of Public Health. I grew up in the South Jersey area, and went to college in Phialdelphia at Thomas Jefferson University, where I got my B.S. in Biology with a minor in Public Health Analytics. My goals post-graduation are to get some work experience and apply to some epidemiology PhD programs. More about me can be found here: insert about tab
